metadata.Plot: A young man takes a succession of odd jobs in order to save enough money to buy he and his mother a house. He lands a position in a newspaper office and falls in love with the beautiful society editor, who is secretly having an affair with the married managing editor. She returns the young man's affections in order to make her lover jealous, but finds herself falling for him.
metadata.Writer: Alice D.G. Miller, Monta Bell, John Colton
metadata.Actors: John Gilbert, Jeanne Eagels, Gladys Brockwell
